keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map d scrollDown count=4
map u scrollUp count=4
map e scrollUp count=4
map Y createTab https://www.youtube.com/
map zz createTab https://www.reddit.com/r/FrugalMaleFashionCDN/new/
map zd createTab https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/my-drive
map zm createTab https://www.google.com/maps/@43.3679098,-79.7648997,15z
map ze createTab https://www.evernote.com/client/web?login=true#?hm=true&
map zs createTab https://open.spotify.com/
mapkey ` <c-[>
map D scrollFullPageDown
map U scrollFullPageUp
map E scrollFullPageUp
map a previousTab
map s nextTab
map q passNextKey
searchEngines:
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
